titleStmt.title: A second dialogue between a new Catholick convert and a Protestant shewing why he cannot believe the doctrine of transubstantiation, though he do firmly believe the doctrine of the Trinity.
titleStmt.author: Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Richard Kidder. cf. NUC pre-1056.
